summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.5°C) and outside temperature (down 11.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 11%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12235 lux) and cloud levels (up 345 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16662 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 232 m), and outside humidity (down 6%) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 344.6m lower than yesterday, 227.4m lower than past week, 232.3m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 425m to a maximum of 1526m, averaging 608.4m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 835.8m and 840.8m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; cold temperatures are forecasted. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and winds should remain light. Chance of light rain, fog or low cloud is expected, and it’s dim outside. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
